fields.name: stories
fields.description: stories.json的内容 获取组件对应的文档数据

fields.name: bricks
fields.description: bricks.json的内容 获取所有组件id

fields.name: snippets
fields.description: snippets.json的内容 获取编排片段数据

request.body:
--abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="packageName"
brick_next --abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="packageVersion"
1.0.0 --abcdefg1234567 Content-Disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="brick_next.tar.gz" Content-Type: application/x-gzip
<File Content> --abcdefg1234567

fields.name: fields
fields.description: 指定返回字段, e.g.: [name, instanceId]

contracts.name: GetDocumentsDetails
contracts.description: 获取已安装小产品的文档详情

contracts.name: GetDocumentsTreeByAppId
contracts.description: 获取已安装小产品的所有文档列表

contracts.name: DeleteInstalledMicroAppContainer
contracts.description: 删除小产品与桌面关系

contracts.name: FindMicroAppContainer
contracts.description: build&push/升级时查找微应用应该关联的容器（容器不存在时， 要创建容器）

fields.name: containerId
fields.description: 小产品应该关联的容器

fields.name: containerType
fields.description: 容器类型， 自定义容器or默认容器

fields.name: containerInstanceId
fields.description: 小产品应该关联的容器的instanceId

contracts.name: GetInstalledMicroApp
contracts.description: 获取已安装小产品信息

fields.name: container
fields.description: 小产品关联的桌面信息

fields.name: menuObjectId
fields.description: 菜单所在模型(独立打包和非独立打包两个菜单模型)

fields.name: appIds
fields.description: 微应用的appIds, 多个用逗号分开

contracts.name: ImportMicroApp
contracts.description: 导入小产品（存在更新，不存在创建）

fields.name: menuIcon
fields.description: 小产品的菜单中显示的图标

fields.name: workflows
fields.description: 小产品关联的工作流定义

request.body:
{
    "icons": {
        "large": "/next/api/gateway/object_store.object_store.GetObject/api/v1/objectStore/bucket/next-builder/object/image16080390648879824081636614785510056761.png"
    },
    "clonedFrom": null,
    "menuIcon": {
        "lib": "fa",
        "type": "",
        "theme": "",
        "icon": "ambulance",
        "prefix": "fas",
        "category": "",
        "color": ""
    },
    "instanceId": "",
    "appId": "my-micro-app",
    "homepage": "/my-micro-app",
    "name": "我的微应用",
    "owner": "defaultUser",
    "storyboardJson": "{\"routes\":[{\"alias\":\"首页\",\"exact\":true,\"hybrid\":false,\"path\":\"${APP.homepage}\",\"public\":false,\"type\":\"bricks\",\"bricks\":[{\"brick\":\"basic-bricks.micro-view\",\"injectDeep\":true,\"portal\":false,\"properties\":{\"pageTitle\":\"Hello world\"},\"slots\":{\"toolbar\":{\"type\":\"bricks\",\"bricks\":[{\"brick\":\"basic-bricks.general-button\",\"events\":{\"general.button.click\":[{\"action\":\"message.success\",\"args\":[\"点击操作按钮\"]}]},\"injectDeep\":true,\"portal\":false,\"properties\":{\"buttonName\":\"操作\"}}]},\"content\":{\"type\":\"bricks\",\"bricks\":[{\"brick\":\"presentational-bricks.brick-result\",\"injectDeep\":true,\"portal\":false,\"properties\":{\"customTitle\":\"Today is Tuesday\",\"status\":\"info\",\"subTitle\":\"2019/10/29 21:35\"}}]}}}]},{\"alias\":\"用户列表\",\"exact\":true,\"hybrid\":false,\"path\":\"${APP.homepage}/users\",\"public\":false,\"type\":\"bricks\",\"bricks\":[{\"brick\":\"basic-bricks.micro-view\",\"injectDeep\":true,\"portal\":false,\"properties\":{\"pageTitle\":\"用户列表\"}}]}],\"meta\":{\"customTemplates\":[],\"menus\":[],\"i18n\":{\"en\":{},\"zh\":{}},\"functions\":[]},\"dependsAll\":false}",
    "installStatus": "ok",
    "tags": [],
    "appVersion": "",
    "internal": "false",
    "private": "false",
    "status": "developing",
    "iconBackground": "",
    "defaultConfig": "",
    "dependsAll": false,
    "legacy": "",
    "env": "",
    "locales": "",
    "visibility": "",
    "layoutType": "",
    "isBuildPush": true,
    "noAuthGuard": false,
    "breadcrumb": "",
    "theme": "",
    "defaultContainer": {
        "id": "",
        "name": "",
        "type": "",
        "order": 0
    },
    "workflows": [
        {
            "id": "janice-workflow1",
            "appId": "janice-hei",
            "name": "janice-workflow1",
            "description": "janice-workflow",
            "workflowYaml": "{\"kind\": \"workflow\", \"id\": \"Ask for leave\", \"name\": \"请假申情\", \"steps\": [{\"id\": \"1\", \"name\": \"开始\", \"type\": \"start\", \"next\": [\"2\"]}, {\"id\": \"2\", \"name\": \"结束\", \"type\": \"end\", \"pre\": [\"1\"]}]}"
        }
    ]
}

contracts.name: ListMicroApp
contracts.description: 获取已安装小产品列表

fields.name: container
fields.description: 小产品关联的桌面信息

fields.name: needCount
fields.description: 需要返回的数量，目前只返回一页，如果这个值为0时，最多返回3000条数据

contracts.name: PackageUpload
contracts.description: 小产品生成打包文件并上传

fields.name: key
fields.description: 按name或appId搜索,%xx%:模糊匹配,xx%:前缀匹配

contracts.name: SearchInstalledMicroAppWithUniqKey
contracts.description: 按唯一key(name,appId,homepage)搜索小产品列表

fields.name: container
fields.description: 小产品关联的桌面信息

contracts.name: UpdateInstalledMicroAppContainer
contracts.description: 更新小产品与桌面关系

fields.name: containerType
fields.description: 容器类型， 自定义容器or默认容器

fields.name: position
fields.description: 微应用在容器中的排序

contracts.name: UpdateCustomItemContainer
contracts.description: 修改自定义项所在桌面容器

contracts.name: UpdateDirContainer
contracts.description: 修改文件夹所在桌面容器

contracts.name: LogAppVersion
contracts.description: 记录小产品版本变化（存在更新，不存在创建）

contracts.name: GetObjectMicroAppList
contracts.description: 查询模型关联小产品列表

contracts.name: GetMicroAppList
contracts.description: 根据模型查询关联小产品列表

contracts.name: GetObjectByMicroApp
contracts.description: 根据小产品查询模型和小产品关联信息

contracts.name: SearchMicroAppList
contracts.description: 搜索模型查询关联小产品列表

contracts.name: GetMicroAppList
contracts.description: 获取所有拥有权限的小产品

description.zh: 获取所有拥有权限的小产品

contracts.name: GetPermissionsByAppId
contracts.description: 获取小产品的所有权限列表

fields.name: status
fields.description: 启用/禁用状态过滤, 空为不过滤

contracts.name: ImportPermissions
contracts.description: 导入小产品权限点（只能导入一个小产品的权限点）

contracts.name: UpdatePermissionBatch
contracts.description: 批量修改实例权限，供LaunchPad管理使用

fields.name: fields
fields.description: updateAthorizers, deleteAuthorizers, readAuthorizers, operateAuthorizers中的一个或多个

fields.name: method
fields.description: 修改操作的类型(overwrite, append, pull)(在枚举之外的操作类型会报错)

fields.name: noAuthorizedList
fields.description: 没有权限更新的实例列表

description.zh: 用覆盖的方式，给easyops分配一个读权限

contracts.name: ReportInstalledBricksNextPackageResult
contracts.description: 上报小产品NB和NT包安装或更新结果

contracts.name: ReportInstalledMicroAppResult
contracts.description: 上报小产品安装或更新结果

contracts.name: GetAllSiteMap
contracts.description: 获取所有系统地图信息

fields.name: value
fields.description: 变量值，type为enum时，使用英文逗号拼接多个枚举值

fields.name: id
fields.description: 任务id, 服务端自动生成

contracts.name: Get
contracts.description: 获取单个工作流任务详情

description.zh: 获取单个工作流任务详情
根据workflowId获取所有工作流任务记录
